<title level="1" right="Hazard 7" pfs="">[Pharaoh's Ward](/Hazards.aspx?ID=475)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A curse is imbued on an entryway’s threshold.

---

**Stealth**
DC 25 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 27 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (master) to painstakingly remove the lintel without triggering the magic, or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493) (4th rank; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=2250) DC 25) to counteract the rune

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Curse the Intruders** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=566), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579)) **Trigger** The seal on the tomb is broken from the outside; **Effect** Each living creature within 60 feet must succeed at a DC 23 Will save or be subjected to the pharaoh’s curse. A cursed creature takes a –2 status penalty to Fortitude saves, and any natural or magical [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=623) it receives is halved. The curse remains until removed by [_cleanse affliction_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1467) or similar magic.

---
**Reset**
The trap resets when the door is shut.
name: Pharaoh's Ward
reset: The trap resets when the door is shut.
